message.relics.version.forge: §4[RELICS-WARN] §cSEEMS LIKE YOU ARE USING AN OUTDATED VERSION OF FORGE. IT'S MEAN THAT RELICS DOESN'T APPEAR IN THE DUNGEONS LOOT CHESTS. TO FIX THIS ISSUE PLEASE UPDATE YOUR FORGE VERSION TO 1.16.5-36.0.14 OR HIGHER. IF YOU FOR SOME REASONS DON'T WANT UPDATE YOUR FORGE VERSION - YOU CAN ADD OWN WAYS TO GETTING RELICS. THIS MESSAGE CAN BE DISABLED IN CONFIG
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.shift_1: After using stores current player position and automatically teleports him to the stored destination after certain time
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.shift_2: Taking fatal damage with active sign in inventory will save your life and teleport you to the stored destination, but breaks relic
tooltip.relics.spider_necklace.shift_1: Grants ability to climb the walls
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.shift_1: Grants ability to disperse poisonous spores when a projectile hits block or mob
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.shift: Slowly accumulates charges to fully reflect projectiles and incoming damage
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.shift_1: Throws a disc that bounces off surfaces and damages everyone in its path
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.shift_2: Damage dealt and time before disc return to the thrower depends on the total number of bounces of surfaces
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.shift_3: Activating disc will force it to return to the owner. Activating disk while holding down the [Shift] key will teleport owner to the current disc position
tooltip.relics.soul_devourer.shift_1: Accumulates souls of defeated entities, proportionally increasing dealing damage
tooltip.relics.soul_devourer.shift_2: Holding down the [Shift] key will release all accumulated souls, dealing damage and knocking everyone around
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.shift_1: Condenses lava underfoot, temporarily transforming it into solid magma stone you can walk on
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.shift_2: Fully removes damage from a hot blocks
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.shift_1: Grants temporary invisibility and movement speed boost at night if wearer's health falls to a low level
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.shift_2: Stealth attacks from invisibility will deal double damage, but temporarily remove invisibility and movement speed boost effects
tooltip.relics.old_boot.shift_1: This boot seems old... By the way, it still can increase my movement speed
tooltip.relics.out_runner.shift_1: Grants ability to gain a movement speed and step height boost after running for a certain distance continuously
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.shift_1: Increases movement speed and step height in desert and mesas
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.shift_2: Increases sand breaking speed, fully removes damage from suffocating in blocks and falling on sand
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.shift_1: When in the offhand, grants chance to summon glaive, which bounces between mobs around
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.shift_2: Glaive damage based on dealt damage before summon and decreases after each bounce
tooltip.relics.stellar_catalyst.shift_1: Grants chance to summon a falling star while attack a mob, which deals half of summon damage for everyone on impact position
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.shift_1: Grants infinity underwater breathing, increases underwater incoming and dealing damage, slightly reduces swimming speed
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.shift_1: Accumulates energy from the nearest dragon breath clouds while holding down the [Shift] key and uses it to increase elytra flying speed while holding same key. Slowly charges in the End
tooltip.relics.elytra_booster.shift_2: Grants ability to ram mobs while flying on elytra with activated boost
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.shift_1: While holding down the [Shift] key, swaps positions of the player and enderman he is looking at
tooltip.relics.fragrant_flower.shift_1: Forces bees around to fight alongside with the relic wearer and makes them friendly to the player
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.shift_1: Increases damage dealt to undead entities and grants ability to set them on fire
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.shift_2: Grants ability to heal instead of taking damage. Increases invulnerability time
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.shift_: Slowly accumulates charges underwater which then can be used to deal electrical damage on collision with mobs
tooltip.relics.hunter_belt.shift_1: Doubles damage dealt to animals and loot received from mobs. Increases damage dealt by wearers pets
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.shift_1: Increases dealt and taken damage from the same target per each combo-attack
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.shift_1: Increases movement speed and grants ability to ram mobs on ice, on high movement speed adds ability to freeze water underfoot
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.shift_2: Dealt damage and knockback force depends on amount of time spend on ice
tooltip.relics.camouflage_ring.shift_1: Grants ability to temporarily hide in a tall grass, stealth attacks will deal double damage
tooltip.relics.delay_ring.shift_1: Temporarily alters an wearer's destiny, delaying any healing and damage taken for next 10 seconds
tooltip.relics.delay_ring.shift_2: Any healing that is delayed by the ring would be doubled
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.shift_1: Grants ability to locate nearest bastion when killing piglins
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.shift_1: Consumes fire around and uses it for a weak levitation ability with igniting mobs under feet
tooltip.relics.chorus_inhibitor.shift_1: Remembers position of the chorus fruit usage, and returns to it after a certain time
tooltip.relics.chorus_inhibitor.shift_2: Additional using of the chorus fruit before time runs out will increase its supply
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.shift_1: Passive ability: Increases bowstring drawing speed
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.shift_2: Active ability: Next shoot after ability use will spawn explosive arrow with damage scaling from shooting distance
tooltip.relics.lucky_horseshoe.shift_1: With a random chance increases player's looting and fortune
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.shift_1: Teleports to the latest known respawn position
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.shift_1: Causes shockwave after player falls on the ground while holding [Shift]
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.shift_2: Increases knockback resistance and grants wall slipping ability
tooltip.relics.amphibian_boot.shift_1: Increases movement speed at the bottom of the sea
advancements.relics.root.title: Relics
advancements.relics.amphibian_boot.title: Better than concrete!
advancements.relics.arrow_quiver.title: Legolas
advancements.relics.bastion_ring.title: Where're we going with Piglet...
advancements.relics.blazing_flask.title: Kaseki's pupil
advancements.relics.delay_ring.title: Heroes never die
advancements.relics.drowned_belt.title: The deeper, the more it hurts
advancements.relics.elytra_booster.title: I believe I can fly
advancements.relics.enders_hand.title: Distance slap
advancements.relics.holy_locket.title: Did you see that? Saw that?!
advancements.relics.hunter_belt.title: How does it feel to be weaker than a dog?
advancements.relics.ice_breaker.title: Mirror's Edge
advancements.relics.ice_skates.title: Yuri on ice
advancements.relics.magic_mirror.title: Deja vu
advancements.relics.magma_walker.title: Trust fall
advancements.relics.midnight_robe.title: Darkwing duck
advancements.relics.old_boot.title: Don't judge a book by its cover
advancements.relics.out_runner.title: Little Muck
advancements.relics.rage_glove.title: Damage is 300 bucks
advancements.relics.shadow_glaive.title: Yamato v0.5
advancements.relics.soul_devourer.title: Gogol would appreciate it
advancements.relics.spatial_sign.title: /sethome
advancements.relics.spore_sack.title: Santa's bag
advancements.relics.stellar_catalyst.tit: This is a rain of stars
